# Disease Prediction Project

This project uses Flask to create a web application that predicts disease spread risk based on Indian mobility data. The application implements a SEIR (Susceptible, Exposed, Infected, Recovered) model and considers mobility patterns between states.

## Project Overview
- Flask web application
- SEIR model implementation
- Indian mobility data analysis
- Risk prediction based on travel patterns

## Dependencies
- Flask
- pandas
- numpy
- scikit-learn
